name: La defensa de Agustina de Aragón
name_original: La defensa de Agustina de Aragón
description:
La defensa de Agustina de Aragón is an action game developed by Expanix. It came out on 09-03-2020.
La defensa de Agustina de Aragón is available on PC, macOS and Linux. The game is sold via itch.io.
